get.description: Returns all list items based on the search criteria.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. The default is 25 and the maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The start of the page offset. The default is from the beginning.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list this item is a member.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the listItem. Text Max length: 64.

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of this item's parent. Is empty when there is no parent.

parameters.name: level1Code
parameters.description: The item code for the first level of the list. All lists have at least a Level1Code. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level2Code
parameters.description: The item code for the second level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level3Code
parameters.description: The item code for the third level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level4Code
parameters.description: The item code for the fourth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level5Code
parameters.description: The item code for the fifth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level6Code
parameters.description: The item code for the sixth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level7Code
parameters.description: The item code for the seventh level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level8Code
parameters.description: The item code for the eighth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level9Code
parameters.description: The item code for the ninth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level10Code
parameters.description: The item code for the tenth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: listitem object to create

get.summary: Get a single listitem by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the listItem.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list this item is a member.

put.description: Updates listitem specified in the URL.  Only the fields provided in the supplied object will be updated, missing fields will not be altered.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the listItem.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The listitem object to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the listitem to delete

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the list associated with a listitem to be deleted

ID.description: The unique identifier of the resource.
